member.name: IStreamPseudoRandomBased.get_ExtendedSeed
member.summary: Retrieves an array of seed values used by the random number generator.
member.param: Array of seed values used by the random number generator.
Number of seed values in the values array.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IStreamPseudoRandomBased.get_Seed
member.summary: Retrieves the seed value used by the random number generator.
member.param: Seed value for the random number generator.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IStreamPseudoRandomBased.put_ExtendedSeed

summary.para:
Sets a list of seed values for the random number generator and seeks to the start of stream.
Note This interface is currently not implemented.

member.param: Array of seed values used by the random number generator.
Number of seed values in the values array.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IStreamPseudoRandomBased.put_Seed
member.summary: Sets the seed value used by the random number generator and seeks to the start of stream.
member.param: Seed value for the random number generator.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

summary.para: Use this interface to generate a read-only data stream whose data is initialized with pseudo-random data (not cryptographically safe). You must call the SetSize method to set the requested size of the stream.

To create an instance of this interface, call the CoCreateInstance function. Use __uuidof(MsftStreamPrng001) for the class identifier and __uuidof(IStreamPseudoRandomBased) for the interface identifier.
